Mayor and City Council
======================

Physical Address:

5705 Azle Ave.  
Sansom Park, TX 76114

Mailing Address:

5705 Azle Ave  
Sansom Park, TX 76114

Phone:

[817-626-3791](tel:8176263791)

| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
